symptoms.name: General unwellness
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild weakness to severe illness depending on cancer growth rate and size

symptoms.name: No symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Possible in early stages or slow-growing cancers

symptoms.name: Compression symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Depending on the organ compressed; can include dysphagia (difficulty swallowing) if esophagus is compressed, dyspnea (shortness of breath) if trachea or lungs are compressed, or chest pain if heart or other structures are compressed

required: Imaging evidence of a mass in the posterior mediastinum
